scripts.setup:prod: node setup/index.js -m enterprise --sm aws --ah crusher.dev --bd https://backend.crusher.dev/ --fd https://app.crusher.dev/
scripts.setup:local: node setup/index.js -m enterprise --sm local --ah localhost --bd http://localhost:8000/ --fd http://localhost:3000/
scripts.setup:docker: node setup/index.js -m enterprise --sm local --ah localhost --bd http://localhost:3000/server/ --fd http://localhost:3000/
scripts.build:oss: sh scripts/build/build-oss.sh && cd docker/oss/ && docker-compose up --build -d
scripts.postinstall: patch-package && sh scripts/download-binaries.sh && yarn workspace crusher-runner-utils build
